item.description:
This will be the last track workout until the new year.

 

Here are the directions to the track.

 

Thanks to John we have a track to run on!!! It is at Albertus Magnus College and here is a bit more information about it:
The track is indeed at the top of the hill uphill from the indoor Cosgrove Marcus Center. I recommend parking in the long downstairs lot (can be trafficky, but no permit needed) or else on the street because there's less parking up top by the track.
Enter at Huntington and Winchester to park; administration/tiny lot and track are uphill (2" walk) on Prospect towards Huntington.
https://maps.google.com/maps?q=c...
item.name: TRACK WORKOUT!!!
